attributes.action: Stop private parking  organisations and companies stealing from the public
attributes.additional_details: Stop private parking businesses from issuing unfair parking fines and stop them stealing fro. The public
attributes.background: Put a stop to busineses that are private car parking enforcement and to stop the theft of public peoples monies and the unfair harassment to people and citizens

rejection.details: The Government is not responsible for what prices private car park operators can charge their customers. Private parking penalties can be enforced through the court system in the same way as an other private financial dispute. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
